name: Simple Geometry (GGenp)
description:
Project 4 for Experimental Game Design, Spring 2023.

Created by: G Li.

How to Play:

  • WASD to move the camera navigate the level
  • Up arrow and down arrow to control the bullet's initial launching direction
  • Space to reset the camera or launch the bullet. The bullet can only be launched when the camera is at the default position
  • Use your geometry knowledge to calculate the bouncy path of the bullet, avoid dangers and hit the target, if you can.

Known Bugs/Issues:

  • The physics sometime behave very weirdly and might make the bullet's path very different from how it is supposed to be, making the game much more difficult than it is supposed to be, even after many nerfs.
